data.title: Slimmed-Down Jefferson Still Big for Pacers
data.meta_description: Go into the Pacers locker room after a homecourt victory and the loudest and longest voice you'll hear likely will be coming from the left side of the room. It's where Al Jefferson holds court. He'll be talking to teammates such as Joe Young to his right, Thaddeus Young to his left, fellow elder statesman Damien Wilkins farther to his left, and sometimes even to Victor Oladipo, near the middle of the room.
